attributes.action: Baroness Thatcher's worldwide achievements to be commemorated by Thatcher Day, a national public holiday.
attributes.additional_details:
In order to demonstrate our support for the achievements of Baroness Thatcher on the world stage and at a national level, the 8th April each year should be designed the official 'Baroness Thatcher Day' as a mark of respect and our appreciation.

We the petitioners call on HM Government to investigate the feasibility of instituting such an occasion to mark the life of the greatest Prime Ministers the UK has ever been blessed to have.
